abstract: Sequence’s new offices are at 337 Broome Street at the Bowery, and it will start with about a dozen employees.
snippet: Sequence’s new offices are at 337 Broome Street at the Bowery, and it will start with about a dozen employees.
lead_paragraph: An innovative agency that works on brand strategy and design assignments, from advertising to app-building, for a blue-chip list of clients like Apple, Chipotle, Walt Disney, Food Network and Google is expanding for the first time outside its home base of San Francisco by opening an office in New York.
